title: Killing Floor 2012  patch v 1.0.3.6 -=AviaRa=-
description:
PC System Requirements

Recommended:
OS: Windows XP/Vista
Processor: 2.4 GHZ or Equivalent
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Graphics: 128 MB DX9 Compliant with PS 2.0 support
Hard Drive: 2 GB free hard drive space
Sound: Eax Compatible

NOTES:

This version of patch is 1.0.3.6 ,playable Online on Private (Cracked) servers or Single Player .
On "Multiplayer" menu you'll find on Favorites Tab up to 40 servers v_1.0.3.6
added by me manually ,tested,working.
Just click on "Refresh List" and choose server to play online.
Feel free to add more servers or delete some servers from favorites.

On this version of game you cannot change name from console !!!
In KillingFloor folder ,open rev.ini with notepad ,find line "PlayerName=aviara.ro" and change aviara.ro with your name !!!!

More info and support here

http://www.aviara.ro/forum/index.php?topic=11440.msg49965#msg49965" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

If you like this game torrent seed it to others.
Enjoy .
